parts.name: Mazdaspeed3 / Volvo C30 Brake Swap
parts.description: The Ford C1 platform is shared between the Ford Focus (Mk2 Euro / Mk3 Global), Mazda3 (BK/BL), and Volvo C30/S40/V50. Brake components are highly interchangeable. Mazdaspeed3 front brakes are a massive upgrade for a standard Mazda3 or Focus.
specs: Volvo C30 T5 Front Rotors: 300mm or 320mm
Calipers bolt up to the knuckles across the platform

parts.name: C1 Platform Rear Sway Bar Interchange
parts.description: Rear sway bars are interchangeable between Mazda3, Mazdaspeed3, Ford Focus, and Volvo C30. The Mazdaspeed3 rear bar is a cheap upgrade for base models.
specs: Whiteline / Eibach aftermarket bars fit all three makes

parts.name: C1 Platform Control Arms
parts.description: Front lower control arms and rear control arms (camber arms, toe arms) are shared across the C1 platform. You can often use 'Ford Focus' parts on a Volvo S40 for a fraction of the price.
specs: Front Lower Control Arms: Check ball joint cone size (18mm vs 21mm depending on year/model)
